title: Data Privacy Attack Defense Strategies in Federated Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental principles of federated learning, machine learning model training processes, and foundational understanding of data security
context.additional_context: For pre-service/in-service math teachers, focuses on understanding privacy vulnerabilities and defense mechanisms in federated learning systems. Strengthens both theoretical concepts and practical response capabilities through real attack scenario analysis

learning_goals: Explain the principles of attribute reconstruction attacks (ARA) that may occur in federated learning environments
Quantitatively assess data leakage risks by analyzing attack simulation results using cos-matching techniques
Design and implement privacy-preserving techniques (e.g., gradient masking, differential privacy) to counter proposed attack methods
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
